# Load the library "read_excel" to import multiple excel sheets into in R.
```{r echo=T,results='hide' , include=TRUE, message=FALSE }
#install.packages("readxl")
library("readxl")  # Import excel files into R. 
```

# Read data.
```{r ,results='hide' , include=TRUE }
 
file<-"Attendee-5.xlsx"

df<-read_excel(file , sheet = "Sheet1" )

#df
```

```{r ,results='hide' , include=TRUE}



df_both <- df[df$`What date(s) will you attend?` == "Both" , ]

df_both <- df_both[!is.na(df_both$Name) ,]

#unique( df_both$Name)

#df_both

```

```{r}
df_both$`Disturbance expertise (wildfires, insect-outbreaks, etc)`
```

